trans-unit.source: Click the following checkboxes to consider or to ignore the corresponding broken links.
trans-unit.target: Tjek de følgende tjekbokse for at overveje eller ignorere de korresponderende brudte links.

trans-unit.source: Path to the content element, which contains the broken link.
trans-unit.target: Sti til det indholdselement, der indeholder det brudte link.

trans-unit.source: Type of the element containing the broken link, its headline and the field in which the broken link is located.
trans-unit.target: Typen af det element, der indeholder det brudte link, dets overskrift, og feltet hvori det brudte link befinder sig.

trans-unit.source: URL to which the broken link is pointing.
Date and time of the last update of the information in each table row.
trans-unit.target: Dato og tid for den seneste opdatering af information i hver tabelrække.

trans-unit.source: UID of the start page for this task.
Level of pages the task should check.
trans-unit.target: Niveau af sider opgaven skal tjekke.

trans-unit.source: TSconfig Code which defines settings for linkvalidator to be used for this task.
trans-unit.target: TSconfig kode der definerer indstillinger for linkvalidator, der skal bruges til opgaven.

trans-unit.source: Email address to which an email report is sent.
trans-unit.target: E-mailadresse til hvem der sendes en rapport.

trans-unit.source: Only send an email, if new broken links were found.
trans-unit.target: Send kun en e-mail, hvis der findes brudte links.

trans-unit.source: Define a template to be used for the email.
trans-unit.target: Definér en skabelon til brug for e-mail.
